title: [Feat]: clearSession option in addition to clearStorage option
body:
### Describe the feature

An option to clear the current session after closing application without deleting configuration (background image, "New Teams calendar", ...)

### Motivation

As long as #1357 is not fixed I prefer to relogin every morning but it's annoying that I have to set some locally saved configurations each day when I'm using the "clearStorage" option. So I would love to have a feature that only clears the session without deleting everything else.
